mapper.sql: POOL_ID, CHARGE_NBR, CHARGE_KEY, IS_USE, USE_TIME, LOCK_ID, DISPLAY_NBR
mapper.insert:
SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY()
insert into VOIP_POOL

CHARGE_KEY,

mapper.update:
update VOIP_POOL
CHARGE_NBR = #{chargeNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHARGE_KEY = #{chargeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_USE = #{isUse,jdbcType=TINYINT},
USE_TIME = #{useTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LOCK_ID = #{lockId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISPLAY_NBR = #{displayNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where POOL_ID = #{poolId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update VOIP_POOL set CHARGE_NBR = #{chargeNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHARGE_KEY = #{chargeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_USE = #{isUse,jdbcType=TINYINT}, USE_TIME = #{useTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LOCK_ID = #{lockId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISPLAY_NBR = #{displayNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where POOL_ID = #{poolId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
UPDATE VOIP_POOL SET LOCK_ID = #{lockId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},IS_USE=1,USE_TIME=GETDATE() where POOL_ID = (SELECT top 1 POOL_ID from VOIP_POOL where IS_USE = 0 ORDER BY NEWID())
UPDATE VOIP_POOL SET LOCK_ID = #{lockId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},IS_USE=1,USE_TIME=GETDATE() where POOL_ID = (SELECT top 1 POOL_ID from VOIP_POOL ORDER BY NEWID())
mapper.select: SELECT top 1 from VOIP_POOL ORDER BY NEWID()
mapper.update: UPDATE VOIP_POOL SET IS_USE=0 where LOCK_ID = #{lockId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
